casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Omar XOCHIMITL, Appellant. 2018-425 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided April 26, 2018

***1040Motion by Make the Road New York et al. for leave to file a submission amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed submission is accepted *841as **502filed. The submission must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
